vqa_benchmarking_backend.bottomupattention.utils.extract_utils.im_list_to_blob(ims)¶

Convert a list of images into a network input.

Assumes images are already prepared (means subtracted, BGR order, …).

vqa_benchmarking_backend.bottomupattention.utils.extract_utils.get_image_blob(im, pixel_means)¶

Converts an image into a network input. Arguments:

im (ndarray): a color image

Returns:

blob (ndarray): a data blob holding an image pyramid im_scale_factors (list): list of image scales (relative to im) used

in the image pyramid
